1. httpd.conf:
CustomLog "|bin/rotatelogs.exe c:/tmp.txt 1024"		common
2. run: "path/to/Apache.exe" -w -n "Apache2" -k restart
creator: Xuefer@21cn.com

text:
Insufficient info to diagnose, so closing invalid.

FWIW you want to look at 2.0.62 and 2.2.7 for a host of piped-log related bug fixes.
